high_descs: Move to the left and pick up the white rag on the ground.
Pick up the white rag on the ground.
Turn around and bring the rag to the lamp on the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the white rag by the light of the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: Look on the floor, turn to your left then turn to your right
Pick up the white cloth on the floor beside the green cloth
Turn to your right and walk across the room, then head to the desk with a lamp
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the cloth by the light

high_descs: Take a step to the left and look at the floor in front.
Pick up the white towel from the floor.
Turn right and head towards the lamp on the desk.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a white towel next to the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Take a half a step to your left.
Pick up the white cloth to the right of the green cloth.
Turn around and take a step then turn left to walk to the desk with the chair and two alarm clocks on it by a light.
Turn on the light.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a cloth in the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn to the left and look down at the floor.
Pick up the white cloth next to the green cloth.
Turn right and face the desk to the right of the recycling bin.
Switch on the lamp on the desk above the alarm clock.
anns.task_desc: Retrieve a cloth and bring it to a lit desk.
